== Velsao (626882) ==

Velsao is a village in the [[Mormugao]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 161.83 hectares and harbouring 335 households with total population of 1520 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MORMUGAO]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 743 and female population is 777. Scheduled Caste Population is 3 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626882<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
